Class Empire.EmpireDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • lord.of.rome.Empire.EmpireDrawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Enclosing class:
    Empire

    static final class Empire.EmpireDrawer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
    Class which represents graphic path of empire. It is singleton class type.
    Author:
    Carlos
